channel.title: Touch Screen on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Touch Screen on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: Control Station Display
item.description: We are going to build a simple control station that begins with a Raspberry Pi and connected 7 inch touchscreen tablet. I decided that it would really cool to use a Raspberry Pi as the control station for MBR, even cooler, why not attach a 7in touch screen to the RPI for configuring and monitoring the robot / system. Power The standard power taken from Mains should be fed with a 2Amp power supply connected to the Display Adapter Card.
